meanings.definition: Malocclusions: Imperfect positioning of the teeth when the jaws are closed.
meanings.sent1: The dentist recommended braces to fix the malocclusions in my teeth.
meanings.sent2: Orthodontists specialize in treating malocclusions for better oral health.
meanings.sent3: My sister joked that her crooked teeth were playing hide and seek with the malocclusions.
meanings.sent4: The misaligned teeth formed a chaotic dance, showcasing the malocclusions.
meanings.sent5: The malocclusions in his smile stood out like a puzzle waiting to be solved.

meanings.definition: Malocclusions: Abnormal alignment of the teeth when the jaws are closed.
meanings.sent1: The orthodontist explained how genetics can contribute to malocclusions in teeth.
meanings.sent2: Regular dental check-ups can help detect malocclusions early on.
meanings.sent3: The malocclusions in the teeth seemed to have a mind of their own, causing mischief.
meanings.sent4: The misaligned teeth whispered secrets about the malocclusions they harbored.
meanings.sent5: The abnormal alignment of his teeth created malocclusions that puzzled many.
